channel.title: DirectX or OpenGL?
channel.description: I still havn't learnt too much about opengl, but from what I have seen it can do just as much as directx. I can easily say I'm fed up with blitz3d and it's directx7 limitation, but when blitzmax's 3d module comes out I'll be porting my game to it, and I want to know: Should I use OpenGL, or Directx(9)? From what directx7 has shown me, it is extremely slow and has many limits. I don't know if directx9 is like that, but I'll have to make a lot more work for myself to change to OpenGL. I was wondering what your views are on it, in both quality and performance? Please only vote if you know what your saying, and if you vote please explain why, thanks!

item.title: DirectX or OpenGL?

item.description:

Yeah plus then I can actually get ti working on linux and mac. But damn this is gonna take forever. Although I think I lack experience with it, I dont know how well I could use it. Plus, the blitzmax 3d module probably wont be done for another year

code it in java, games like wurm online use advanced classes that fully support openGl and stuff, its pretty cool

it would probably be one huge pain in the ass however :P...
